dungeon.name: The Crenellated Spire
dungeon.description: The mages of Amalao are forbidden to perform spells that give life to the land, but Archmage Demarq defied these commands and created an artifact known as the Phatasmagoric Flame, which brings to life elementals bent on destruction. The counselors of Amalao have sent you to the top of the Crenellated Spire, so that you might destroy the Phantasmagoric Flame and bring Demarq to justice for his crimes.

floor.name: Entryway
floor.description: Complete this floor in 6 beats or fewer to acquire a Key

floor.name: Floor 2
floor.description: Complete this floor in 7 beats or fewer to acquire a Key

floor.name: Floor 3
floor.description: Complete this floor with at least one party member taking no damage to acquire a Key

floor.name: Spire Vault A
floor.description:
You come upon a room filled with Locked Chests. You can spend 1 Key per effect to get that effect.

New Weapon! - One fighter gains a Beta or Delta Base of choice (swapping out the matching Normal Base)
New Armor! - One fighter's armor is upgraded to the next level, and he gains 5 life.
New Trinket! - Gain the 'Sprint Shoes' or 'Power Glove' Trinket.

floor.name: Floor 4
floor.description: Complete each beat on a space with a mushroom to acquire a Key

floor.name: Floor 5
floor.description:
Defeat the elementals in the following order to acquire a Key:
Earth, Fire, Wind, Water

floor.name: Spire Vault B
floor.description:
You come upon a room filled with Locked Chests. You can spend 2 Keys per effect to get the effect.

New Weapon! - One fighter gains an EX base, swapping out the matching Normal Base.
New Potions! - Gain a 'Life Potion' and a 'Swiftness Potion'
New Trinket! - Gain the 'Displacer Charm' Trinket

floor.name: Floor 6
floor.description: During the floor, if the same player deals the killing blow to all 3 enemies, acquire a Key

floor.name: Floor 7
floor.description: During this floor, if the same player deals the killing blow to all 3 enemies, acquire a Key.

floor.name: Caged Elemental Room
floor.description:
You come upon a laboratory filled with captive, sentient Elementals, who beg you to set them free before the madness of the flame corrupts them. It takes 3 Keys to free them. You may...

- Leave them in captivity (Do nothing)
- Let them escape (Lose 3 Keys)
- Use the Elemental Forge to convert them into a weapon of power (Lose 3 Keys, gain an Almighty Base, swapping it with the corresponding normal one)

floor.name: Floor 8
floor.description: During this floor, if each player deals the killing blow to exactly one enemy, acquire a Key

floor.name: Floor 9
floor.description: During this floor, if each player deals the killing blow to exactly one enemy, acquire a Key

floor.name: Spire Vault C
floor.description:
You come upon a room with 2 locked chests. You may spend 3 keys per chest to open a chest and claim the item inside.

Legendary Weapon! - Each player gains an Almighty Base, swapping it for the matching normal.
Rare Trinket! - Both players gain a 'Phase Cloak' Trinket
Super Potion! - Both players regain 10 life.

floor.name: Spire Peak
floor.description: Archmage Demarq has become corrupted by the distoring light of the Phantasmagoric Flame. Only by defeating him once and for all can you quench the flame and restore balance!
